message: My turn. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  I think that's more reflective of the game's rules.
I'm willing to budge a little, but 60/40 is too much.  Let's meet in the middle at 55/45.
Time is running out!  I'll come down a bit to 58/42.
Let's be reasonable. I'll give you a bit more, but I won't go below 52. Take it or leave it!
Okay, final offer. 56/44, or we both lose out!
